Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Bathtub or Shower stall and Telephone. Lobby-Bar, Laundry, Business center. Conference room capacity: 90 persons.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: situated in the historic center of Zaporizhzhia city, on the main Lenin Avenue near the Theatre named after Magar, Festivalnaya square in the city center -4km. Nearest station/metro: Railway station -2km / Central Bus station -1km. Nearest airport: Airport -12km.
